name: 3dSen Maker
description:
3dSen Maker

A unique emulator/tool that is capable  to create 3d profiles of NES games and play them in realtime.

Some profiles are included in 3dSenMaker as the reference points: SMB, SMB3, Legend of Zelda, Micro Mages.

It is recommended to read the documents before creating profiles for yourself.
